 */export const CRYPTO_ICONS={BTC:'â‚¿',ETH:'Îž',USDT:'â‚®',USDC:'$',BNB:'ðŸ”¶',SOL:'â—Ž',ADA:'â‚³',DOT:'â—',DOGE:'Ã',MATIC:'ðŸ”·',LTC:'Å',LINK:'ðŸ”—',UNI:'ðŸ¦„',DAI:'â—ˆ',XRP:'âœ•'};export const CRYPTO_EMOJIS={BTC:'ðŸª™',ETH:'ðŸ’Ž',USDT:'ðŸ’µ',USDC:'ðŸ’µ',BNB:'ðŸ”¶',SOL:'â˜€ï¸',ADA:'â™ ï¸',DOT:'âš«',DOGE:'ðŸ•',MATIC:'ðŸŸ£',LTC:'âš¡',LINK:'ðŸ”—',UNI:'ðŸ¦„',DAI:'ðŸ’š',XRP:'ðŸ’§'};export const CRYPTO_COLORS={BTC:'#F7931A',ETH:'#627EEA',USDT:'#26A17B',USDC:'#2775CA',BNB:'#F3BA2F',SOL:'#14F195',ADA:'#0033AD',DOT:'#E6007A',DOGE:'#C2A633',MATIC:'#8247E5',LTC:'#345D9D',LINK:'#2A5ADA',UNI:'#FF007A',DAI:'#F4B731',XRP:'#23292F'};/**
 * Get crypto icon with fallback
 */export const getCryptoIcon=currency=>{return CRYPTO_ICONS[currency===null||currency===void 0?void 0:currency.toUpperCase()]||'ðŸª™';};/**
 * Get crypto emoji with fallback
 */export const getCryptoEmoji=currency=>{return CRYPTO_EMOJIS[currency===null||currency===void 0?void 0:currency.toUpperCase()]||'ðŸª™';};/**
 * Get crypto color with fallback
 */export const getCryptoColor=currency=>{return CRYPTO_COLORS[currency===null||currency===void 0?void 0:currency.toUpperCase()]||'#00F0FF';};/**
 * Format currency with icon
 */export const formatCryptoWithIcon=(amount,currency)=>{const icon=getCryptoIcon(currency);return"".concat(icon," ").concat(amount," ").concat(currency);};/**
 * Render crypto badge component (inline styles)
 */export const CryptoBadge=_ref=>{let{currency,showName=true,size='medium'}=_ref;const sizes={small:{icon:'16px',text:'0.75rem',padding:'4px 8px'},medium:{icon:'20px',text:'0.875rem',padding:'6px 12px'},large:{icon:'24px',text:'1rem',padding:'8px 16px'}};const currentSize=sizes[size]||sizes.medium;const emoji=getCryptoEmoji(currency);const color=getCryptoColor(currency);return{emoji,color,style:{display:'inline-flex',alignItems:'center',gap:'6px',padding:currentSize.padding,background:"".concat(color,"22"),border:"1px solid ".concat(color),borderRadius:'8px',fontSize:currentSize.text,fontWeight:'600',color:color}};};export default{CRYPTO_ICONS,CRYPTO_EMOJIS,CRYPTO_COLORS,getCryptoIcon,getCryptoEmoji,getCryptoColor,formatCryptoWithIcon,CryptoBadge};
